review: Worthless, I have not even been able to listen to a song. Forget watching any streaming video.hFirst off, No Volume Control. The only TWO ways you can not blast your ear drums out. One, buy a TV which has volume control. Two buy a "DAC" Digital Audio Controller. Three buy a Home Theater PC. I paid $80 for a pair of computer speakers.... guess what the Amazon Fire like blasts the audio so loud that even these speakers can Not turn the volume down.Second, Even if you get the franking Volume so its not blasting your eardrums out.... unlikely, without spending 4x what the franking Fire Stick costs.... You STILL Can Not Watch Any Video..... Why? Because the franking idiots expect you to stream 1080p video over WiFi !!!!... Is there a way to knock it down to what WiFi can handle, such as 360p... NO, No you can not. It has to fracking "Stream" 1080p video over WiFi!!!What a worthless peace of crap. I am so Ultra Pissed off.
